EmailTemplate.name: VHM-Appliance-Nurture0.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Activation}}: Your Virtual Health Monitor Download
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Activate Virtual Health Monitor & Map Your Environment. Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Heyo! Look at you go. You just downloaded a free and unlimited instance of the VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor (VHM). You're on your way to what we at VMTurbo call “environment enlightenment”. Within minutes, you’ll have mountaintop visibility into your virtual environment, and wield the power (use it wisely) to identify problems in real time. Performance reports? All yours. In perpetuity. Forever.
Once you've deployed VHM, the initial credentials are administrator for username and password. The setup wizard will handle the rest. Ready for the big leagues? Download a full-featured 30-day trial of VMTurbo Operations Manager <http://bit.ly/1k61Zyy>, the world’s most advanced virtualization management platform.
<http://bit.ly/1k61Zyy>
Looking forward to your success, VMTurbo Need help? Call us at (877) 978 8818. 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
contact us <http://go.vmturbo.com/contact-us.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | website <http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | privacy policy <http://www.vmturbo.com/privacy-policy?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker>
